This new framework will only cover written materials, but its existence will impact creators of all stripes ‚Äî including but not limited to authors, independent publishers, video producers, and actual play troupes. entry.content: Image: Sony Interactive Entertainment Plus Axiom Verge, all available Jan. 2 Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Bethesda Softworks‚Äô Fallout 76 headline games PlayStation Plus Essential subscribers get access to beginning Jan. 2, Sony announced on Wednesday. They‚Äôre joined by Axiom Verge 2, the side-scrolling indie Metroidvania that launched in 2021. Fallen Order needs little introduction; it‚Äôs a Star Wars adventure set in the aftermath of the Empire‚Äôs hunt for, and elimination of, the Jedi Knigh...

entry.title: Collecting rare Magic: The Gathering cards actually benefits artists | Polygon - Gaming
entry.summary: Whitebacks are almost as old as the game itself At most Magic: The Gathering events, you will see guest artists with binders of cards ‚Äî the prices of which are very different than you‚Äôd expect. These...
entry.content: Whitebacks are almost as old as the game itself At most Magic: The Gathering events, you will see guest artists with binders of cards ‚Äî the prices of which are very different than you‚Äôd expect. These are likely artist proofs, also known as ‚Äúwhitebacks,‚Äù or ‚ÄúAPs.‚Äù So, what are artist proofs and why should you care? To start with, you don‚Äôt have to care. Whitebacks are a totally optional thing in Magic, just like Secret Lair drops to an extent. But they represent a level of interest in the hobby ...

entry.title: EHR-Safe: Generating High-Fidelity and Privacy-Preserving Synthetic Electronic Health Records | Google AI Blog
entry.summary: Posted by Jinsung Yoon and Sercan O. Arik, Research Scientists, Google Research, Cloud AI Team Analysis of Electronic Health Records (EHR) has a tremendous potential for enhancing patient care, quanti...
entry.content: Posted by Jinsung Yoon and Sercan O. Arik, Research Scientists, Google Research, Cloud AI Team Analysis of Electronic Health Records (EHR) has a tremendous potential for enhancing patient care, quantitatively measuring performance of clinical practices, and facilitating clinical research. Statistical estimation and machine learning (ML) models trained on EHR data can be used to predict the probability of various diseases (such as diabetes), track patient wellness, and predict how patients respon...

entry.content: Posted by Pritish Kamath and Pasin Manurangsi, Research Scientists, Google Research Differential privacy (DP) is an approach that enables data analytics and machine learning (ML) with a mathematical guarantee on the privacy of user data. DP quantifies the ‚Äúprivacy cost‚Äù of an algorithm, i.e., the level of guarantee that the algorithm‚Äôs output distribution for a given dataset will not change significantly if a single user‚Äôs data is added to or removed from it.
